Title: Édes Emma, drága Böbe - vázlatok, aktok
Actors: Johanna ter Steege, Enikö Börcsök, Péter Andorai, Éva Kerekes
Plot: The story shows Emma's and Böbe's fight for survival, for keeping their position in society which they achieved with hard work in the previous regime. They don't want to lose their place and become village girls again.
